name: hot-import
description: Hot Module Re-Import on Change for Node.js

scripts.lint: tslint --version && tslint --project tsconfig.json "{src,tests}/**/*.ts" --exclude "tests/fixtures/**" --exclude "dist/" && npm run clean && tsc --noEmit
scripts.test: npm run lint && npm run test:unit
scripts.test:npm: npm run dist && cross-env-shell TMPDIR=/tmp/npm-package-test.$$ 'npm pack && mkdir $TMPDIR && mv *-*.*.*.tgz $TMPDIR && cp tests/fixtures/smoke-testing.js $TMPDIR && cd $TMPDIR && npm init -y && npm i *-*.*.*.tgz && node smoke-testing.js'
